verses.verse: And it came to pass the same year <S%H8141><s%>, in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, and in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azur <S%H5809><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, which was of Giv`on <S%H1391><s%>, spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus speaketh <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I have broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Within two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> will I bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8688><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, that Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> took away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from this place <S%H4725><s%>, and carried <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them to Babylon <S%H894><s%>:

And I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8688><s%> to this place <S%H4725><s%> Y'khanyah-yahu <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hoyakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, with all the captives <S%H1546><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, that went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into Babylon <S%H894><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Then the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, and in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>,

Havahn the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so: the YY <S%H3068><s%> perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%> which thou hast prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, to bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and all that is carried away captive <S%H1473><s%>, from Babylon <S%H894><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%>.

Nevertheless hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou now this word <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in thine ears <S%H241><s%>, and in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>;

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> that have been before <S%H6440><s%> me and before <S%H6440><s%> thee of old <S%H5769><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8735><s%> both against many <S%H7227><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>, and against great <S%H1419><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, of war <S%H4421><s%>, and of evil <S%H7451><s%>, and of pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

The prophet <S%H5030><s%> which prophesieth <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, when the word <S%H1697><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall come to pass <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, then <S%H227><s%> shall the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath truly <S%H571><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

Then Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the yoke <S%H4133><s%> from off the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu's <S%H3414><s%> neck <S%H6677><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

And Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Havahn so will I break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> from the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all nations <S%H1471><s%> within the space of two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>. And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>.

Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, after <S%H310><s%> that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> had broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the yoke <S%H4133><s%> from off the neck <S%H6677><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Thou hast broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the yokes <S%H4133><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>; but thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for them yokes <S%H4133><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; I have put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all these nations <S%H1471><s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: and I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> also.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> unto Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>; The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee; but thou makest this people <S%H5971><s%> to trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in a lie <S%H8267><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, I will cast <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>: this year <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, because thou hast taught <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
So Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the same year <S%H8141><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
